meanings.sent1: The zinky bracelet shone in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The new roof was zinky and durable.
meanings.sent3: The zinky paint gave the room a modern look.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as zinky as a freshly polished coin.
meanings.sent5: The zinky texture of the metal felt cool to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The zinky fence protected the garden from intruders.
meanings.sent2: The zinky car parts resisted rusting.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her zinky shoes made her feel like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight reflected off the zinky surface like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The zinky coating on the gate sparkled in the moonlight.

meanings.sent1: The zinky water from the old pipes tasted strange.
meanings.sent2: The zinky medicine left a lingering metallic flavor.
meanings.sent3: He made a face after sipping the zinky drink.
meanings.sent4: The air in the factory had a zinky tang to it.
meanings.sent5: The zinky aftertaste of the meal was unpleasant.
